titles.title: To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to provide for treatment of distinct population segments of the Eastern oyster as separate species.
To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to provide for treatment of distinct population segments of the Eastern oyster as separate species.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: Amends the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to treat distinct population segments of the Eastern oyster as separate species.
